partintro.simpara: These functions allow read-only access to data stored in filePro databases.
filePro is a registered trademark of fP Technologies, Inc. You can find more information about filePro at &url.filepro;.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Read and verify the map file

refentry.refsect1:
Description
boolfilepro stringdirectory
This reads and verifies the map file, storing the field count and info.
No locking is done, so you should avoid modifying your filePro database while it may be opened in PHP.
&note.sm.uidcheck;

refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the name of a field

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the name of the field corresponding to field_number.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the type of a field

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the edit type of the field corresponding to field_number.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the width of a field

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the width of the field corresponding to field_number.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Retrieves data from a filePro database

refentry.refsect1:
Description
stringfilepro_retrieve introw_number intfield_number
Returns the data from the specified location in the database.
&note.sm.uidcheck;

refnamediv.refpurpose: Find out how many fields are in a filePro database

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the number of fields (columns) in the opened filePro database.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Find out how many rows are in a filePro database

refentry.refsect1:
Description
intfilepro_rowcount
Returns the number of rows in the opened filePro database.
&note.sm.uidcheck;
See also filepro.
